Talk03_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yeah. <sp:5:1:0>Have you ever looked up at the
peak of the spire here in Rito Village?
Talk03_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That bit jutting out sideways looks kind
of like a bird's perch, right? <sp:5:0:0>We call it
<clr:0000>Vah Medoh's perch<clr:ffff>.
Talk10: <sp:3:0:2:0c01>Over there? No, I don't think that was it.
Talk03_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>I told you about how the peak of the spire
the village is built around is called <clr:0000>Vah
Medoh's perch<clr:ffff>, right?
Talk06_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm. <sp:5:0:0>Was there anything that stood out?
Let me think...
Talk01_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm. <sp:5:1:0>That cave...where was it again?<sp:5:1:0>
Oh, hello.
Talk04_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>When I happened to look west while up on
that perch, basking in the sun at dawn...<sp:0:4:0>I saw a single <clr:0000>white bird<clr:ffff> resting atop the
<clr:0000>long shadow of the perch<clr:ffff> caused by the
angle of the morning sun.
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_01>Hey! <sp:5:1:0>If it isn't the guy who worked with
Tulin to save the village.<sp:0:4:0>Everyone in the village is happy to stretch
their wings again without them icing over.<sp:5:0:0>
So thanks for that.<sp:0:4:0>And the end of the blizzard has improved
visibility too. <sp:5:0:0>It's much easier now to find
<clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff> where we can gather food!
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_00>I saw one just the other day, in fact, while
I was flying around...<sp:5:1:0>but I forgot exactly
where it was.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>It had a <clr:0000>rock wreathed in green light<clr:ffff>
inside it, just like the one beneath the
general store.<sp:0:4:0>Just where did I see that <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>, anyway?<sp:5:0:0>
I found it while I was looking for that
<clr:0000>white bird<clr:ffff>...
Talk04_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>After I was done sunning, I went to have
a look at the <clr:0000>bird<clr:ffff>, but it wasn't there
anymore. <sp:5:1:0>There was just a <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff> entrance.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300>The white bird was nice enough to lead
me to that cave, so it's frustrating that
I can't remember where it was now.
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Yeah...there were mushrooms in it and
a pond with fish. It would've been the
perfect place to stock up on supplies.<sp:0:4:0>All I remember is that I found it while
looking for that <clr:0000>white bird<clr:ffff>.
Talk03_00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Sure. I don't mind telling the story again.<sp:5:1:0>
I found that cave while looking for a
<clr:0000>white bird<clr:ffff>.
Talk04_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>It's weird for a bird to rest on a shadow,
right? <sp:5:1:0>I was curious, so I went to go have
a look where I saw the bird.<sp:0:4:0>Thing is, I couldn't find the white bird
again after that. Instead, I found a
<clr:0000>cave entrance<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>It's kind of like the <clr:0000>white bird<clr:ffff> led me to
that <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_01>I don't know why I can remember all that
so clearly, but not where the cave was...
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Part of my morning routine is to head up
there and bask in the sun as it rises.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>That day, I was getting some sun up on
the perch, same as always, just when the
<clr:0000>dawn was breaking<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Right about then...<sp:5:1:0>I looked to the west
and saw a <clr:0000>white bird<clr:ffff> resting atop the <clr:0000>long
shadow of the perch<clr:ffff>.
Talk02_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey there! <sp:5:1:0>I still haven't figured out where
I saw that <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff> the other day...
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>I was lucky to find it. I don't think the
area around the entrance was anything
special or memorable.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>But it was <clr:0000>right next to a resting white
bird<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>That much, I do remember.<sp:0:4:0>Deep inside, I could make out a <clr:0000>rock<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>wreathed in green light<clr:ffff> like the one
that's beneath the general store now.
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_01>Ugh. If I could just remember where I
found it, we'd have one more place to
search for food.
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Yeah! That's the cave, all right! So you
found it on your own, huh?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>I remembered that it was near where I saw
the bird from the peak of Rito Village, on
the tip of Vah Medoh's perch's shadow...<sp:0:4:0>But I'd never have found it again without
your help, so I appreciate you telling me.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Maybe I'll check it out soon to see what
kind of food we can scrounge there. <sp:5:1:0>I bet
Bedoli would like to come along.
